lead_paragraph: Taxpayer-financed research can generate large rewards down the road. In an era of tight budgets, a slice of the profits could finance new innovations.

headline.print_headline: Public R&D, Private Profits and Us
headline.main: Government R&D, Private Profits and the American Taxpayer

snippet: Taxpayer-financed research can generate large rewards down the road. In an era of tight budgets, a slice of the profits could finance new innovations.
abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column examines whether government should seek return on its investment in basic scientific research, observing that change could potentially help stem decline in federal investment; notes that in era of tight budgets, public investment in research has declined significantly; cautions that some observers say proposal could also harm innovation.
